title: Impact of family-centered care in families with children with intellectual disability: A systematic review
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Teresa Dionísio Mestre, Manuel José Lopes, David Matias Mestre, Rogério Ferrinho Ferreira, Ana Pedro Costa, Ermelinda Valente Caldeira
